definition: to fit/suitable/proper/just (now)/comfortable/well/to go/to follow or pursue
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

sentences.english: Resilience is not simply an individual characteristic or a psychological phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 适应力不单单是个体特征或者心理现象。

sentences.english: Extendibility is the ease of adapting software products to changes of specification.
sentences.chinese: 扩充性是指易于修改软件以适应规格变化。

sentences.english: It becomes second nature to adapt your own style to that of the person with whom you are speaking.
sentences.chinese: 这成为将你的风格与谈话者相适应的第二天性。

sentences.english: Resistant to blight, tolerate to re-plant and drought. Wide adaption.
sentences.chinese: 抗枯萎病能力强，耐重茬，耐旱，适应广。

sentences.english: These trees adapted more easily to the red earth here.
sentences.chinese: 这些树更适应这里的红土。

sentences.english: The adaptive law using stability theory is derived.
sentences.chinese: 按李雅普诺夫稳定性理论设计自适应控制器。

sentences.english: Bachu mushroom has more adapt to soil nutrient.
sentences.chinese: 巴楚蘑菇对土壤营养条件有很强的适应性。

sentences.english: This small window of consciousness was renowned as the best time for boning.
sentences.chinese: 这种1小时的有意识状态被认为是最佳的适应时间。

sentences.english: The adaptability of ground-cover Chrysanthemum group in Hainan is studied.
sentences.chinese: 文章报道了地被菊在海南引种的适应性情况。

sentences.english: A new scheme used in single-phase adaptive reclosure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种单相自适应重合闸的新方案。

sentences.english: The ecological implication of this life history strategy of rice water weevil was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 文中讨论了双季稻区稻水象甲生活史对策的适应意义。

sentences.english: Then adaptive NNs (Neural Networks) are introduced for their structure and approximation ability.
sentences.chinese: 接着对自适应神经网络及其逼近特性加以介绍。

sentences.english: The performance of the adaptive algorithm can directly affect the effect of the echo canceller.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法的性能直接影响着回波消除器的效果。

sentences.english: The adaptability of red clover was also good.
sentences.chinese: 红三叶的适应性也较好。

sentences.english: Dead-zone operator is adopted in the adaptive algorithm, which improves the robustness of the algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 自适应算法中采用了死区算子，增强了算法的鲁棒性。

sentences.english: In my experience the Adaptive and Exploratory approaches are one in the same.
sentences.chinese: 根据我的经验，自适应式和探索式的方法大致相同。

definition: to blend into/to integrate/to assimilate/to merge
nothing much changes (idiom); always the same/stuck in a rut
habit/custom/usual practice/to be used to/CL:個|个[ge4]
(try to) overcome (hardships etc)/to conquer/to put up with/to endure
